00031 class Object: public Function {
00032     public:
00034         typedef std::vector<unsigned> uintvec1D;
00036         typedef std::vector<uintvec1D> uintvec2D;
00037 
00038         Object (const QString &, unsigned, unsigned);
00039         virtual ~Object () { }
00040         virtual void ReInit (double, double, double,
00041                              double, double, double,
00042                              double, double, double);
00043 
00044         virtual void Transform (const VecMath::Rotation<4> &R,
00045                                 const VecMath::Vector<4> &T);
00046         virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00047         virtual void Draw (void);
00048         virtual VecMath::Vector<4> &operator () (double, double, double) {
00049             static VecMath::Vector<4> tmp;
00050             return tmp;
00051         }
00052 
00054         virtual const unsigned getDefinitionSpaceDimensions() { return 0; }
00055 
00056     protected:
00057         virtual void Initialize();
00059         unsigned NumVertices;
00061         unsigned NumSurfaces;
00062 
00063         vec4vec1D X;        
00064         vec4vec1D Xtrans;   
00065         vec3vec1D Xscr;     
00066

00069

00076             static VecMath::Vector<4> tmp;
00077             return tmp;
00078         }
00079 };

00086 class Hypercube: public Object {
00087 public:
00088     Hypercube (): Object ("Hypercube", 16, 24) {
00089         a = 1;
00090         declareParameter("Size", 1.0);
00091         Initialize();
00092     }
00093     Hypercube (double _a,
00094                const VecMath::Vector<4> &_Center = VecMath::Vector<4>(0., 0., 0., 0.));
00095     virtual ~Hypercube() { }
00096 
00097     virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &parms) {
00098 #       if 1
00099             for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parms.begin();
00100                  i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00101                 if (i->second->getName() == "Size") a = double(*i->second);
00102             }
00103 #       else
00104             setParameter(parms, this->a, "Size");
00105 #       endif
00106     }
00107 
00108     virtual std::string description () {
00109         std::ostringstream out;
00110         out << "Hypercube (a = " << a << ")" << std::ends;
00111         return out.str ();
00112     }
00113 protected:
00114     virtual void Initialize();
00115     void DeclareSquare (unsigned, unsigned, unsigned, unsigned, unsigned);
00116 
00117     double a;
00118     VecMath::Vector<4> center;
00119 };

00123     const bool registeredH = TheFunctionFactory::Instance().registerFunction("Hypercube", createHypercube);

00161     Sponge (unsigned _level = 1, unsigned _distance = 2, double _rad = 0.8,

00170     virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &parms) {
00171         std::cerr << "Sponge::SetParameters(" << parms.print() << ")\n";
00172 #       if 1
00173             for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parms.begin();
00174                  i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00175                 if (i->second->getName() == "Level")
00176                     Level = unsigned(*i->second);
00177                 if (i->second->getName() == "Distance")
00178                     distance = unsigned(*i->second);
00179                 if (i->second->getName() == "Size")
00180                     rad = double(*i->second);
00181             }
00182 #       else
00183             setParameter(parms, this->Phase, "Phase");
00184 #       endif
00185         }
00186 
00188     virtual void ReInit (double, double, double,
00189                          double, double, double,
00190                          double, double, double) {
00191         List.clear();
00192         Object::ReInit(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
00193     }
00194 
00196     virtual std::string description () {
00197         std::ostringstream out;
00198         out << "Sponge (level = " << Level << ")" << std::ends;
00199         return out.str ();
00200     }
00201

00203     virtual void Initialize();

00278 
00279         virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &parms) {
00280 #       if 1
00281             for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parms.begin();
00282                  i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00283                 if (i->second->getName() == "Level")
00284                     Level = unsigned(*i->second);
00285                 if (i->second->getName() == "Size")
00286                     rad = double(*i->second);
00287             }
00288 #       else
00289             setParameter(parms, this->Phase, "Phase");
00290 #       endif
00291         }
00292

00294                              double, double, double,
00295                              double, double, double) {
00296             List.clear();
00297             Object::ReInit(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
00298         }
